forgot_password.title: Wibagiwe ijambo ry'ibanga
forgot_password.description: Injiza imeri yawe kugira ngo usubizeho konti yawe

reset_password.title: Shyiramo Ijambo Ry'ibanga Rishya
reset_password.description: Ijambo ry’ibanga rigomba kuba ritarakoreshejwe mbere

success.title: Byakozwe Neza
success.description: Mwakoze neza! Konti yawe yashyizwe mu buryo neza. Urashobora kwinjira ubu.

home.good_weather_advice: Uyu munsi ni ikirere cyiza cyo gukoresha imiti yica udukoko
home.leave_confirmation_message: Uzi neza ko ushaka gusohoka muri iyi group? Ushobora kongera kuyinjiramo nyuma.

blockAccountConfirmation.title: Emeza gufunga konti
blockAccountConfirmation.description: Wizeye ko ushaka gufunga iyi konti? Iyi ngingo ntishobora gusubirwaho.

profileChangePassword.title: Bikira Konti Yawe
profileChangePassword.description: Kubera umutekano, nyuma yo guhindura ijambo ry'ibanga, uzasohoka mu buryo bwikora. Nyamuneka, menya neza ko ijambo ry'ibanga rishya atari iryo wabanje gukoresha. Ijambo ry'ibanga rishya n'iryemezo bigomba guhura kugirango ukomeze.

community.manageCommunitiesContent: Bungura imiryango yawe y'ubuhinzi. Injira mu miryango isanzweho, kandi uhuze n'abandi bashakashatsi. Sangiye ubumenyi, ubunararibonye n'imyitwarire myiza n'abandi banyamuryango b'umuryango.
community.myPostsContent: Reba kandi ukore ku myandiko yawe y'umuryango. Hindura ibikubiye, kandi urebe uko imyandiko yawe ifasha abandi bashakashatsi. Sangiye urugendo rwawe rw'ubuhinzi n'ibitekerezo n'umuryango.

emptyPosts.title: Nta Byanditse Biriho
emptyPosts.description: Kurikira imiryango myinshi kugirango ubone ibyanditse bishimishije kandi wihuze n'abandi basangira inyungu nawe.

community.deleteDescription: Wizeye ko ushaka gusiba iyi post?

createPost.title: Shyiraho ubutumwa bushya mu muryango
createPost.pleaseSelectCommunity: Nyamuneka hitamo umuryango wo gutangamo ubutumwa.

diagnosis.title: Isuzuma ry'Igihingwa & Inyoboranyobozi y'Ubuvuzi

take_photo.title: Fata cyangwa Ohereza Ifoto
take_photo.description: Urupapuro nyamukuru rwerekana amahitamo abiri: 'Fata Ifoto' cyangwa 'Ohereza Ifoto'.

crop_detection.title: Gusuzuma Igihingwa
crop_detection.description: Nyuma yo gufata cyangwa kohereza ifoto, porogaramu ihita itunganya ishusho.

instant_diagnosis.title: Isuzuma ako kanya
instant_diagnosis.description: Iyo ishusho imaze gutunganywa, porogaramu ihita itanga ibisubizo by’isuzuma.

treatment_suggestions.title: Inama z’Ubuvuzi
treatment_suggestions.description: Tanga urutonde ruto rw’imiti cyangwa intambwe z’icyakorwa.

diagnosis.hands_full: Ufite amaboko yuzuye? Koresha buto yo gukina kugira ngo wumve.
diagnosis.media_permission: Uburenganzira bwo gukoresha ububiko bw'amashusho burakenewe!

help.title: Ubufasha
help.subject: Ingingo
help.request_sent_success: Ibisabwa byoherejwe neza. Ibindi bizahuzwa binyuze kuri email.
